choices.answer: Restates what the author says in the text.
A statement that explains main ideas of a text in own words
Lengthy paragraph that recounts what happened in a text.
Gives fun facts mentioned in the text with other details

questions.question: How long should a summary be?

choices.answer: 5-7 sentences long
An essay with a topic sentence and conclusion
Several paragraphs with lots of details
A couple sentences
True
False

questions.question: What is the main idea of the passage?

choices.answer: San Francisco has many great things to do.
It does not snow normally in California
The weather in California is generally mild
Many people like to visit San Francisco

questions.question: What are the details supporting the main idea of the passage?

choices.answer: Does not get very cold or hot, cool breezes, no snow often
People move there, it is cold, it's a great place to live
San Francisco  is on the east coast and it is the bay area
Weather is very comfortable

questions.question: What is the main idea of this text?

choices.answer: There are a lot of cows in Texas
Texas is one of the largest states in the U.S.
There are alligators in the swamp lands of Texas
There are a variety of places and landscapes in Texas

questions.question: What are the details that support the main idea of this passage?

choices.answer: Cowboys, Cattle, and Alligators
People use lots of sailboats and powerboats on the waters
There is open prairie, mountains, and waters of the coast
Exotic wildlife, activities, land

questions.question: Which is not part of the 5 W's of summarizing?

choices.answer: Who
What happened
When
With

questions.question: When asked to summarize, you should....

choices.answer: Rewrite the passage word for word
Include the important facts and details from the text
Only include the details of the text
State all the fun facts
